verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329><s%> Musician <S%H5329><s%> upon Shushaneduth, <S%H7802><s%> Michtam <S%H4387><s%> of David, <S%H1732><s%> to teach; <S%H3925><s%> when he strove <S%H5327><s%> with Aramnaharaim <S%H763><s%> and with Aramzobah, <S%H760><s%> when Joab <S%H3097><s%> returned, <S%H7725><s%> and smote <S%H5221><s%> of Edom <S%H123><s%> in the valley <S%H1516><s%> of salt <S%H4417><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> thousand. <S%H505><s%> O God, <S%H430><s%> you have cast <S%H2186><s%> us off, you have scattered <S%H6555><s%> us, you have been displeased; <S%H599><s%> O turn <S%H7725><s%> yourself to us again. <S%H7725><s%>
You have made the earth <S%H776><s%> to tremble; <S%H7493><s%> you have broken <S%H6480><s%> it: heal <S%H7495><s%> the breaches <S%H7667><s%> thereof; for it shakes. <S%H4131><s%>
You have showed your people <S%H5971><s%> hard <S%H7186><s%> things: you have made us to drink <S%H8248><s%> the wine <S%H3196><s%> of astonishment. <S%H8653><s%>
You have given <S%H5414><s%> a banner <S%H5251><s%> to them that fear <S%H3373><s%> you, that it may be displayed <S%H5127><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of the truth. <S%H7189><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
That your beloved <S%H3039><s%> may be delivered; <S%H2502><s%> save <S%H3467><s%> with your right <S%H3225><s%> hand, <S%H3225><s%> and hear <S%H6030><s%> me.

God <S%H430><s%> has spoken <S%H1696><s%> in his holiness; <S%H6944><s%> I will rejoice, <S%H5937><s%> I will divide <S%H2505><s%> Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> and mete <S%H4058><s%> out the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Succoth. <S%H5523><s%>
Gilead <S%H1568><s%> is mine, and Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> is mine; Ephraim <S%H669><s%> also is the strength <S%H4581><s%> of my head; <S%H7218><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> is my lawgiver; <S%H2710><s%>

Moab <S%H4124><s%> is my wash pot; <S%H5518><s%> <S%H7366><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> Edom <S%H123><s%> will I cast <S%H7993><s%> out my shoe: <S%H5275><s%> Philistia, <S%H6429><s%> triumph <S%H7321><s%> you because <S%H5921><s%> of me.
Who <S%H4310><s%> will bring <S%H2986><s%> me into the strong <S%H4692><s%> city? <S%H5892><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> will lead <S%H5148><s%> me into <S%H5704><s%> Edom? <S%H123><s%>
Will not you, O God, <S%H430><s%> which had cast <S%H2186><s%> us off? and you, O God, <S%H430><s%> which did not go <S%H3318><s%> out with our armies? <S%H6635><s%>
Give <S%H3051><s%> us help <S%H5833><s%> from trouble: <S%H6862><s%> for vain <S%H7723><s%> is the help <S%H8668><s%> of man. <S%H120><s%>
Through God <S%H430><s%> we shall do <S%H6213><s%> valiantly: <S%H2428><s%> for he it is that shall tread <S%H947><s%> down our enemies. <S%H6862><s%>
